mapper.select: select ec.id,ec.title, ec.lesson_num as lessonNum,ec.cover, et.name as teacherName from x_course ec left outer join x_teacher et on ec.teacher_id=et.id where ec.id=#{courseId}

SELECT ec.id,ec.title, ec.lesson_num AS lessonNum,ec.cover, ec.view_count AS viewCount, et.id AS teacherId,et.name AS teacherName,et.intro,et.head_portrait from x_course ec left outer join x_teacher et on ec.teacher_id=et.id where ec.id=#{courseId}
mapper.update: update x_course set view_count=view_count+1 where id=#{courseId}
